title: Effect of storage, temperature, and pH on the preservation of the oleuropein content of olive leaf extracts
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,750-759
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00044G, Paper
Open Access

Fereshteh Safarzadeh Markhali, José A. Teixeira
Effect of storage/thermal conditions on the oleuropein content of olive leaf extracts. The extracts obtained by ohmic heating show the maximum levels of oleuropein over different time points.
